title: Ticket #6475: preen erroneously removes submit digests for active clusters
description: condor_preen removes the spooled submit digest files that are created for late materialization job factories while the cluster in which they belong is still active. This causes late materialization job factories to stop materializing jobs after the schedd is restarted.
remarks:
2018-Jan-23 14:18:05 by tannenba:
Couple comments:

  1. The commit [52771] completely breaks condor_preen in v8.7.6, causing it to remove files for active jobs because proc_exists() was modified to always return false. The only thing saving us from disaster here is v8.7.6 also had another preen bug introduced that caused preen to core dump before it erroneously removed files. Whew!

  2. Why was this ticket resolved without any version history entry?
